articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: How Trumpism explains the GameStop stock surge
articles.description: At the core of Donald Trump's angry populist appeal was -- and is -- this sentiment: The elites think they know better than you. They think they can tell you how to live and what to believe. But guess what? We the people are smarter than the elites!
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.description: With the year's first full moon appearing on Thursday, it's helpful to know that people tend to go to bed later and sleep less in the days leading up to a full moon, according to a new study.
